te: ఇడ్లీ, పూరీ, మినపట్టూ, పెసరట్టూ మరియు ఉప్మా ఉన్నాయి.
en: There are idli, poori, minapattu, pesarattu and upma.
Minapattu and pesarattu are also hot.
What do you want among these?
Then I need only cold water.
The drinking water available in this hotel is not cold.
Then who is there in the class?

te: ఆ కాయితం మీద ఎర్రగా ఉంది; ఏమిటది?
en: Something is reddish on that paper; what is it?
Breakfast or light meal (Indian English word)
pesarattu (savory pancake made from green gram batter)
name of a patent health drink product 'Bournvita'
